Our only issue was that the fire alarm was disconnected from the ceiling and then started beeping early in the morning due to low battery. Battery cover was stuck, so I couldn't remove the battery. I assume the cleaner couldn't get it open either as it was just sitting on the dresser upon arrival. Holly was great when I mentioned it and said she would get it replaced.
The price is great, the home is great (squeaky bathroom doors ànd all!). The location was perfect for us as my kids could walk down to family nearby.
I wouldn't hesitate to book again during our next trip.
Thanks again, Holly! You've done a great job on this one!
